cancelcluster.name: CancelCluster
cancelcluster.description: Grants permission to cancel a cluster job

canceljob.name: CancelJob
canceljob.description: Grants permission to cancel the specified job

createaddress.name: CreateAddress
createaddress.description: Grants permission to create an address for a Snowball to be shipped to

createcluster.name: CreateCluster
createcluster.description: Grants permission to create an empty cluster

createjob.name: CreateJob
createjob.description: Grants permission to creates a job to import or export data between Amazon S3 and your on-premises data center

createlongtermpricing.name: CreateLongTermPricing
createlongtermpricing.description: Grants permission to creates a LongTermPricingListEntry for allowing customers to add an upfront billing contract for a job

createreturnshippinglabel.name: CreateReturnShippingLabel
createreturnshippinglabel.description: Grants permission to create a shipping label that will be used to return the Snow device to AWS

describeaddress.name: DescribeAddress
describeaddress.description: Grants permission to get specific details about that address in the form of an Address object

describeaddresses.name: DescribeAddresses
describeaddresses.description: Grants permission to describe a specified number of ADDRESS objects

describecluster.name: DescribeCluster
describecluster.description: Grants permission to describe information about a specific cluster including shipping information, cluster status, and other important metadata

describejob.name: DescribeJob
describejob.description: Grants permission to describe information about a specific job including shipping information, job status, and other important metadata

describereturnshippinglabel.name: DescribeReturnShippingLabel
describereturnshippinglabel.description: Grants permission to describe information on the shipping label of a Snow device that is being returned to AWS

getjobmanifest.name: GetJobManifest
getjobmanifest.description: Grants permission to get a link to an Amazon S3 presigned URL for the manifest file associated with the specified JobId value

getjobunlockcode.name: GetJobUnlockCode
getjobunlockcode.description: Grants permission to get the UnlockCode code value for the specified job

getsnowballusage.name: GetSnowballUsage
getsnowballusage.description: Grants permission to get information about the Snowball service limit for your account, and also the number of Snowballs your account has in use

getsoftwareupdates.name: GetSoftwareUpdates
getsoftwareupdates.description: Grants permission to return an Amazon S3 presigned URL for an update file associated with a specified JobId

listclusterjobs.name: ListClusterJobs
listclusterjobs.description: Grants permission to list JobListEntry objects of the specified length

listclusters.name: ListClusters
listclusters.description: Grants permission to list ClusterListEntry objects of the specified length

listcompatibleimages.name: ListCompatibleImages
listcompatibleimages.description: Grants permission to return a list of the different Amazon EC2 Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) that are owned by your AWS account that would be supported for use on a Snow device

listjobs.name: ListJobs
listjobs.description: Grants permission to list JobListEntry objects of the specified length

listlongtermpricing.name: ListLongTermPricing
listlongtermpricing.description: Grants permission to list LongTermPricingListEntry objects for the account making the request

listpickuplocations.name: ListPickupLocations
listpickuplocations.description: Grants permission to list Address objects where pickup is available, of the specified length

listserviceversions.name: ListServiceVersions
listserviceversions.description: Grants permission to list all supported versions for Snow on-device services

updatecluster.name: UpdateCluster
updatecluster.description: Grants permission to update while a cluster's ClusterState value is in the AwaitingQuorum state, you can update some of the information associated with a cluster

updatejob.name: UpdateJob
updatejob.description: Grants permission to update while a job's JobState value is New, you can update some of the information associated with a job

updatejobshipmentstate.name: UpdateJobShipmentState
updatejobshipmentstate.description: Grants permission to update the state when a the shipment states changes to a different state

updatelongtermpricing.name: UpdateLongTermPricing
updatelongtermpricing.description: Grants permission to update a specific upfront billing contract for a job
